<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Darricus Stallit](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2023)</title>

<trait label="Medium" />

<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +17; sharp eyes

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Criminal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +14, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +1

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Sharp Eyes** Darricus doesn't need to succeed at a flat check to target [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) creatures, and he is not [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to creatures that are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from him.

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [bastard sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15)_, [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (10 arrows), constable's badge, [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12), steel shield (Hardness 3, HP 20, BT 10) (Hardness 3, HP 20, BT 10)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 122

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_bastard sword_ +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +16 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Power Attack** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Darricus makes a melee Strike that counts as two attacks when calculating his multiple attack penalty. If this strike hits, it deals an extra die of weapon damage.

**Swipe** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Darricus makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within his melee reach and adjacent to each other. He rolls damage only once and applies it to each creature he hit. This Strike counts as two attacks for calculating his multiple attack penalty.

</column>
name: Darricus Stallit
